text:
to the true values in the test set and an error measure calculated. We will calculate the root
mean squared error, or RMSE, between predictions and the true values.
RMSE is calculated as the square root of the average of the squared diﬀerences between
the forecasts and the actual values. The measure rmse() implements this below using the
mean squared error() scikit-learn function to ﬁrst calculate the mean squared error, or MSE,
before calculating the square root.
